name: Congenital Pyloric Stenosis with Atypical Presentation
chief_complaint: My baby keeps vomiting after feeding and seems hungry all the time
prognosis: Excellent with timely surgical intervention, full recovery expected
description: A congenital condition where the pyloric muscle hypertrophies, causing gastric outlet obstruction. This case presents atypically with less pronounced weight loss but marked electrolyte imbalance.
multiple_choice: Congenital Pyloric Stenosis with Atypical Presentation
